remarks: Variant of Zorn's lemma ~ zorng in which ` (/) ` , the union of the empty chain, is not required to be an element of ` A ` .  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 5-Jan-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2015.)
statement:
zornn0g $p |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ A =/= (/) /\ A. z ( ( z C_ A /\ z =/= (/) /\ [C.] Or z ) -> U. z e. A ) ) -> E. x e. A A. y e. A -. x C. y ) $.
$d A x y z $.
